column2: Forge a new Empire by combining Kingdoms
As a great King, we can declare a new empire, distinct from all those that came before.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has at least 3 kingdom titles which [Root.GetSheHe] completely controls
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] completely controls the [This.GetFullName]
Every county and duchy in [This.GetFullName] is owned by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals)
!!!DEBUG MODE!!! No limit on [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm size!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm size is less than 120 (excluding vassal MR family palaces)
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will form a new empire by merging [Root.GetHerHis] completely-controlled kingdoms.
The new empire's coat of arms and map colour will be based on [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s primary title: the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName].
Becomes de jure part of the new empire, and is then destroyed.
[This.GetName] becomes the traditional capital province of the new empire.
Declare the Kingdom of Crete

The Kingdom of Crete was, in ancient history, a strong and independent realm. It is also a strategic island fortress in the Eastern Mediterranean. Therefore, let us recreate the ancient kingdom and declare ourselves the rightful masters of the mythical land of Minos!
Divide Sicily
The Kingdom of Sicily will henceforth be divided into two separate realms: the island of Sicily, and mainland southern Italy.
Declare the Kingdom of Taurica

The kingdom of Crimea is mostly a barbaric wasteland, fit only for nomads. However, the port city of Cherson and its environs are civilised and strategically located. Therefore, let us declare a new kingdom of Taurica!
Declare the Kingdom of Mann

Although the culture in Isle of Mann is similar to that of its neighbours in Great Britain and Ireland, it has always retained its own unique identity. Therefore, let us formalise this separation by declaring a new kingdom of Mann!
Declare the Kingdom of Gotland

The island of Gotland is strategically located in the middle of the Baltic Sea, and its inhabitants long for independence from the mainland. We are now in a position to fulfil that desire - by declaring a new kingdom of Gotland!
Declare the Kingdom of Iceland

The island of Iceland, originally uninhabited, was settled by Norse explorers in the 9th century and has since been largely ignored by the rest of Scandinavia and Europe. Let us therefore proclaim a new kingdom of Iceland, so that we may better manage our own affairs without European interference.
Declare the Balearic Kingdom

The Balearic islands have been known since antiquity as the home of a unique culture which produced, among other things, some of the best slingers in the known world. Therefore, let us formalise this separation by declaring a new Balearic Kingdom!
Declare the Kingdom of Socotra

The island of Socotra is located far from the mainland and is surrounded by treacherous currents, so it has always been somewhat autonomous. Therefore, let us reaffirm that autonomy by declaring a new kingdom of Socotra!
Declare the Kingdom of Kutch

The islands of Kutch are surrounded by marshes and salt flats, which are impassible for most of the year. Therefore, let us proclaim a new kingdom of Kutch, wholly separate and independent from mainland affairs.
Declare the Kingdom of the Maldives

The islands of the Maldives have always been viewed as a backwater and an afterthought by the inhabitants of southern India and Lanka. Let us therefore proclaim a new kingdom of the Maldives, so that we may better manage our own affairs without mainlander interference.
Create the Kingdom of Cyprus
A new era will begin with my ascension as King of Cyprus.
column3: Une nouvelle ère commence avec mon ascension sur le trône de Roi de Chypre.
column4: Eine neue Ära wird mit meinem Aufstieg zum König von Zypern beginnen.
column6: Empieza una nueva era con mi ascenso al trono de Chipre.

column1: # Saxony - requires conquest of multiple duchies

column2: Create the Kingdom of Saxony
Having conquered all of the lands of Saxony, it is only right to reinstate the Kingdom of Saxony!
Create the Duchy of Rhodes
We believe that the island of Rhodes should be viewed as its own separate island entity, unrelated to the mainland.
Create the Duchy of Canarias
We believe that the islands of Canarias should be viewed as their own separate island entity, unrelated to the mainland.
Create the Duchy of Malta
We believe that the island of Malta should be viewed as its own separate island entity, unrelated to the mainland.
Create the Duchy of Kutch
We believe that the islands of Kutch should be viewed as their own separate entity, unrelated to the mainland.
Create the Duchy of the Maldives
We believe that the islands of the Maldives should be viewed as their own separate entity, unrelated to the mainland.
Merge Mallorca into the Kingdom of Sardinia
As the King of Sardinia, we can rightfully claim that all western Mediterranean islands should be part of our kingdom!
Merge Rhodes into the Kingdom of Cyprus
As the King of Cyprus, we can rightfully claim that all eastern Mediterranean islands should be part of our kingdom!
Merge Krete into the Kingdom of Cyprus
As the King of Cyprus, we can rightfully claim that all eastern Mediterranean islands should be part of our kingdom!
